The Lone Ranger 2013 TS READNFO XViD - JUSTiCE
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1210819/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1210819/</a>

 SOURCE : VIDEO - RAVERS / AUDIO - AFRIEND


 Video and audio both cleaned and given justice.
 Check sample and see.....


 Ok video first ...video was really nice Q too be honest,but had wonky borders due to being cammed
 at an angle.Also noticed when in vdub the fast action scenes started to break up...also the contrast
 and brightness levels were off that caused some glare.

 Audio ...very nice line audio but due to being FM sourced you sometimes get static or hissing etc..which
 is the case but much better than previous audios eg monster uni etc...

 Right so first off dropped the video in vdub and used the quad filter to level up the top and bottom,then 
 pulled in the right handside a touch as it was sloping left to right.From there used null to crop the borders.
 After it as a case fixing the contrast and brightness levels and using the intes to lower the glares/bright spots,then 
 changed the colouring with rgb eq and reszied it.
 Finally i used a HQ smoother to smooth out the breaks up that happened during the action scenes,whilst also balancing
 out the sharpness so didn't lose too much detail.
 Oh also cut the unwanted video that was left in ;-) ....if ya seen the sors files you'll know....but you don't miss ANY 
 of the film still.

 Audio was syncd to our rip ....pretty straight forward if honest,then it was dropped in adobe and remastered it changing the
 EQ bands to balance it out better aswell as removing some of the hiss this way before removing the rest of the hiss with a removal
 filter.

 Overall ...a vert nice TS indeed IMHO ...V8 A8 M7 :)

 DME2 next :)
